name: End of Hubbard Track
description: The ignominious end of Hubbard Track, where the dusty path finally gives way to a more pungent reality. The track ends here, not with a grand vista, but with a large, fragrant pile of horse manure, a subtle reminder of the harsh realities of frontier life. To the west, a faint, rutted trail beckons, a weary ribbon leading towards the untamed wilderness. Hubbard Track continues its arduous journey to the north, a rutted path through sparse scrub and scattered rock formations. The air is thick with the smell of the stable, a stark contrast to the vague aspirations of civilization.
